title: Google\Cloud\CertificateManager\V1\CertificateMapEntry
name: CertificateMapEntry
description:
Defines a certificate map entry.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.certificatemanager.v1.CertificateMapEntry

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A user-defined name of the Certificate Map Entry. Certificate Map Entry names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/certificateMaps/*/certificateMapEntries/*.

params.name: data.description
params.description: One or more paragraphs of text description of a certificate map entry.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The creation timestamp of a Certificate Map Entry.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The update timestamp of a Certificate Map Entry.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Set of labels associated with a Certificate Map Entry.

params.name: data.hostname
params.description: A Hostname (FQDN, e.g. example.com) or a wildcard hostname expression (*.example.com) for a set of hostnames with common suffix. Used as Server Name Indication (SNI) for selecting a proper certificate.

params.name: data.matcher
params.description: A predefined matcher for particular cases, other than SNI selection.

params.name: data.certificates
params.description: A set of Certificates defines for the given hostname. There can be defined up to fifteen certificates in each Certificate Map Entry. Each certificate must match pattern projects/*/locations/*/certificates/*.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. A serving state of this Certificate Map Entry.
